title: Luxury Certified Artist Apartment in Allston-Income Restrictions Apply
posting_body: Please visit our website to learn more and request an application:
The Arthaus is designed to expand your horizons while enjoying the finest combination of amenities.
Arthaus is located in Allston, MA easily accessible to shopping, eateries, The Boston University campus, and 6 miles to downtown Boston.
Getting around is as easy as hopping on the Green Line or taking the MBTA Commuter Rail.
This development has a total of 9 income-restricted units.
These are BPDA Certified Artists units.
♦ SmartHome Technology with Keyless Entry System
Pet Friendly- 1 pet limit per unit
Garage Parking- $250 per month (Pricing is subject to change)
♦ Sky Lounge with Entertaining Space & Demonstration
♦ High-Tech Fitness Center with Peloton and MIRROR
♦ Think Tank, Individual Work Booths & Seating
Private Work Pods & Gourmet Coffee Bar
Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.
You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.
